translated: The Collection of Triads🔽The First Chapter
They say I’m wise and peaceful,

analyzed: alam attha vicintaka  pañca kāmaguṇāḥ loke
translated: fit to reflect on the meaning.🔽But the five strands of sense pleasure
in the world have brought me down.
I was caught in Māra’s domain,
the noose of the King of Death.
But all my sense pleasures are abandoned,
The round of births is ended:
there is no return to any existence.”
